Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.pointMultiplyer

Class WritingMaterialsCardPointMultiplier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardReleted.pointMultiplyer.WritingMaterialsCardPointMultiplier
All Implemented Interfaces:
GoldCardPointMultiplier, Serializable
public class WritingMaterialsCardPointMultiplier extends Object implements GoldCardPointMultiplier
This class is a multiplier for the points given by a gold card that gives points for the number of a specific writing material collected
